name: Cuban-Style Yuca
author: Cocina JNOTS
summary: Made with yuca, or cassava, a Latin American root vegetable similar to potatoes, this simple dish is the way my granny used to make it.
ingredients: 2 pounds yuca, peeled and sliced lengthwise
directions: Place the yuca into a pan and fill with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, cover, and cook until tender, about 15 minutes
Drain, and place yucca on a serving plate
Meanwhile, place the olive oil, onion, garlic, and lemon juice into a pan
Cook over medium heat about 5 minutes
Pour the hot olive oil mixture over the yuca, and serve immediately
